course_1.introduction: Intro to NEPSE and stock market basics.
course_1.description: Learn how NEPSE works, opening Demat account, and basic investing.

course_2.title: Basics of Mutual Funds
course_2.introduction: Learn what mutual funds are and how they work.
course_2.description: An easy guide to investing in mutual funds in Nepal.

course_3.title: Savings vs. Investing
course_3.introduction: Understand the difference between saving and investing.
course_3.description: Learn when to save and when to invest money.

course_4.title: Understanding Interest Rates
course_4.introduction: Learn how interest rates affect your money.
course_4.description: Covers simple vs compound interest, and market impact.

course_5.title: Technical Analysis Basics
course_5.introduction: Learn how to read stock charts and trends.

course_6.title: Fundamental Analysis
course_6.description: Learn ratios, balance sheets, and earnings.

course_8.title: Portfolio Building
course_8.description: Stocks, mutual funds, fixed income assets.

course_9.title: Advanced Technical Analysis
course_9.introduction: Learn deep technical patterns, oscillators, and trend analysis.
course_9.description: Covers chart patterns, trend lines, Fibonacci, and oscillators for experienced traders.

course_10.title: Risk Management Strategies
course_10.introduction: Master capital preservation and money management techniques.
course_10.description: Learn to calculate position sizes, set stop losses, and manage risk-to-reward.

course_11.title: Algorithmic Trading with Python
course_11.introduction: Build automated trading bots using Python.
course_11.description: Covers pandas, NumPy, APIs, and backtesting tools for algo trading.

course_12.title: Market Sentiment Analysis
course_12.introduction: Use news and public data to gauge market psychology.
course_12.description: Dive into sentiment tools, news impact, and social media analysis.

course_13.title: Quantitative Trading Models
course_13.introduction: Build data-driven strategies with quant models.
course_13.description: Includes statistical arbitrage, regression, and ML models for trading.

course_14.title: Portfolio Optimization Strategies
course_14.introduction: Design diversified portfolios using advanced techniques.
course_14.description: Learn Sharpe ratio, alpha-beta, and efficient frontier concepts.

course_15.title: Global Markets and Interconnectivity
course_15.introduction: Understand how global events impact local markets.
course_15.description: Covers macroeconomic factors, currency flows, and trade linkages.

course_16.title: Behavioral Finance Mastery
course_16.description: Covers loss aversion, overconfidence, anchoring, and herd behavior.
